articles.title: Talks between Foreign Ministers of DPRK, Algeria Held
articles.content:
Talks between Foreign Ministers of DPRK, Algeria Held
Pyongyang, June 1 (KCNA) -- Talks between DPRK Foreign Minister Ri Su Yong, head of the DPRK government delegation to the conference of foreign ministers of the Non-Aligned Movement, and Algerian Foreign Minister Ramtane Lamamra were held at the building of the Algerian Foreign Ministry on Saturday.
					 Present at the talks from the DPRK side were members of the delegation and the DPRK ambassador to Algeria and from the opposite side the general secretary and general directors of the Foreign Ministry.
					
					 At the talks both sides informed of the situation in their countries and exchanged views on the issue of developing the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries in various fields, the issue of boosting cooperation in international arena and other issues of mutual concern.

articles.title: KPA Service Personnel Starts Study Tour of Revolutionary Battle Sites in Area of Mt. Paektu
articles.content:
KPA Service Personnel Starts Study Tour of Revolutionary Battle Sites in Area of Mt. Paektu
Hyesan, June 1 (KCNA) -- Service personnel of the Korean People's Army (KPA) started their study tour of revolutionary battle sites in the area of Mt. Paektu.
					 An inaugural ceremony took place before the Monument to the Victorious Battle of Pochonbo in Hyesan City, Ryanggang Province on Sunday.
					
					 Present there were officials of the Ministry of the People's Armed Forces and members of the study tour group.
					
					 The participants laid a floral basket and bouquets before the statue of President Kim Il Sung and paid tribute to him.
					
					 Flags bearing the portraits of smiling Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il were entered the meeting place.
					
					 Om Hyang Chol, chairman of the KPA committee of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League, made a report.  
					
					 The reporter said that Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un organized the study tour of revolutionary battle sites in the area of Mt. Paektu for commanding officers of the combined units of the KPA and made sure that service personnel made a study tour of them again.
					
					 The study tour will mark a milestone of epochal turn in preparing all the service personnel to be ones strong in idea and faith who firmly armed with the revolutionary spirit of Mt. Paektu, the soul and life of the Korean revolution, and bringing about a great leap forward in boosting military capability with firm confidence in victory, the reporter noted.
					
					 He called upon all the service personnel to carry on the march started on Mt. Paektu under the Songun revolutionary leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un with the great pride and self-esteem that they are the descendants of Mt. Paektu and successors to the revolution.
					
					 Then followed speeches. 
					
					 The flag of the study tour group was awarded to it.
					
					 When the order was issued, members of the study tour group started the march toward Mt. Paeku, holding the flags bearing the portraits of the smiling Generalissimos in the van of the ranks and fluttering flags of the supreme commander, Workers' Party of Korea, the DPRK and the study tour group.
					
					 Leading officials, working people and school youth and children in in the province and the city warmly saw off the members of the study tour group.

articles.title: International Children's Day Marked in DPRK
articles.content:
International Children's Day Marked in DPRK
Pyongyang, June 1 (KCNA) -- A joint friendship meeting was held at the Mangyongdae Amusement Park on Sunday to mark the 64th anniversary of the International Children's Day.
					 Present there were Choe Ryong Hae, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, officials concerned, unconverted long-term prisoners and children and women in Pyongyang.
					
					 Present there on invitation were diplomatic envoys, staff members of foreign embassies and missions of international bodies here and their children and women and other foreign guests and overseas Koreans staying in the homeland.
					
					 Kim Jong Sun, chairwoman of the C.C., the Democratic Women's Union of Korea, made a congratulatory speech.
					
					 Then followed a true story-telling meeting and art performance presented by children.
					
					 Put on the stage were such colorful numbers as song and dance "Pleasant Holiday, the Day When the Marshal Came", kayagum solo "I Am a Flower Bud" and sports dance "Flower Buds of Korea".
					
					 The performers truthfully represented bright and cheerful life of the children growing up stoutly to be happy children of Songun Korea and masters of the future under the warm loving care of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Chorus "Let's present to Marshal" performed by foreign children and chorus story-telling "Thanks to Marshal Kim Jong Un" by children of Pyongyang Orphanage was acclaimed by the audience.
					
					 There took place sports and amusement games.
					
					 The optimistic appearance of "children of great strength" competing at the Ssirum (Korean wrestling) ground and children jumping over flower-decorated ropes are fanning up the atmosphere of the meeting.
					
					 DPRK and foreign children competed in the running with their hand taken by their mothers with a ball in arms, ball shooting, toy picking and tug of war, sharing the feelings of friendship.
					
					 At the end of the games the participants spent a pleasant time, dancing together and using amusement facilities.

articles.title: DPRK Students Prove Successful at Int'l Concours
articles.content:
DPRK Students Prove Successful at Int'l Concours
Pyongyang, June 1 (KCNA) -- DPRK students Kim Hak Hyon and Choe Kum Song proved successful at the international juvenile player and composer concours "Musical Art" held in Moscow from May 21 to 25. They are studying at Moscow Tchaikovsky State Conservatory of Russia.
					 The concours was aimed to find out talented juvenile musicians and boost cultural cooperation among countries. It brought together over 340 students from the DPRK, China, France, Austria, Japan, Belarus, Ukraine and other countries.
					
					 Kim and Choe successfully represented music composed by Beethoven and Tchaikovsky with the playing of woodwind instruments on May 24 to be acclaimed by juries and audience.
					
					 At a closing ceremony they were most highly estimated in the category of instrumental ensemble.
					
					 Musical experts admired the rosy prospect for the development of the DPRK woodwind ensemble, saying that the DPRK students gave wonderful rendition as good as professional players.

articles.title: Implementation of June 15 Joint Declaration Called for in S. Korea
articles.content:
Implementation of June 15 Joint Declaration Called for in S. Korea
Pyongyang, June 1 (KCNA) -- Kim Ji Yong, chairwoman of the south Korean Democratic Women's Society in Japan, made public an article titled "Implementation of the June 15 joint declaration is the way for all Koreans to live together" on May 27.
					 The article said nearly 70 years have passed since the division of the nation.
					
					 The June 15 joint declaration clearly indicates the way for relieving such pain, the article said, adding that the only way is to solve the issue of reunification in an independent way by the Korean nation itself.
					
					 It noted that Koreans should pool their efforts to force Japan to liquidate its past crimes related to sexual slavery committed by the Japanese imperialists, the unethical crimes, and stop the moves to unreasonably discriminate Koreans in Japan, distort history, revive militarism and reinvade the Korean peninsula through the exercise of the "right to collective self-defense."
					
					 If the Park Geun Hye regime truly wants reunification, it should not incite confrontation through cooperation with outsiders but lift the "May 24 step" which stands in the way of exchange and cooperation between the south and the north in the spirit of the June 15 joint declaration, it stressed.

articles.title: S. Korean Organization Starts 10 Million-People Signature Campaign
articles.content:
S. Korean Organization Starts 10 Million-People Signature Campaign
Pyongyang, June 1 (KCNA) -- The Measure Committee of the Families of Victims, Missing Persons and Survivors of the Ferry Sewol Sinking Accident of south Korea started 10 million-people signature campaign on May 29 demanding the thoroughgoing probe into the truth behind the ferry disaster and punishment of those responsible for it, according to south Korean MBC.
					 The organization urged the authorities to thoroughly probe the truth behind the ferry disaster and call to account those responsible for it.
					
					 It called for organizing a fact-finding organ with independent authority with the bereaved families and people involved.
					
					 It decided to conduct signature campaigns at incense-burning alters in 16 cities and provinces across south Korea in solidarity with civic and public organizations.
					
					 The evermore mounting south Korean people's anti-"government" actions are driving the conservative ruling forces into a tight corner.

articles.title: S. Korean Paper Condemns "Saenuri Party"
articles.content:
S. Korean Paper Condemns "Saenuri Party"
Pyongyang, June 1 (KCNA) -- An editorial condemning the crimes of the "Saenuri Party" under the title "Group of evil fostering social confusion and division" was posted on the south Korean internet paper Voice of People on May 28.
					 The chairman of the joint election measure committee of the party blustered in Taejon on May 27 that it was a well-known fact that there is a group of evil fostering social confusion and division with hot words whenever a crisis presents itself, the editorial charged.
					
					 His reckless remarks show that the election campaign of the party is going beyond a tolerance limit, it said, and went on:
					
					 He is not qualified to say about this.
					
					 He is the very one who fostered social confusion and division with hot words as the chief of the election measure headquarters of Park Geun Hye in the 2012 "presidential" election. Such a guy is talking about "a group of evil". This is just like a thief crying "Stop thief".
					
					 The group of fostering social confusion and division should be removed.
					
					 If the group of evil is allowed to stay in power, it is impossible to prevent social disasters and tragedies.
					
					 Political forces fostering social confusion and division by habitually floating false rumors in each election are the group of evil.

articles.title: Unionists of KBS Enter into General Strike
articles.content:
Unionists of KBS Enter into General Strike
Pyongyang, June 1 (KCNA) -- The Trade Union of south Korean KBS and the KBS headquarters of the Media Trade Union entered into a joint general strike on May 29, according to the south Korean internet paper Voice of People.
					 At the ceremony related the strike held in Youido, Seoul speakers said they entered an indefinite general strike from the dawn of the day in demand of the resignation of the president of KBS and an apology of Park Geun Hye.
					
					 They noted that attending the strike were all unionists of KBS including journalists, announcers, PD makers, photographers, technicians, managers and directors. 
					
					 It has been disclosed that Chongwadae and Kil Hwan Yong, president of KBS, were interfered in the reports about the ferry Sewol but those protesting against this are being labeled "leftist", they charged. They will fight it out though the KBS side threatened to take steps for discipline and layoff while talking about illegal strike, they said, adding: We will fight to make KBS not be neglected and ridiculed by the people again.
					
					 Then the participants staged a demonstration, chanting slogans "KBS president, no need. Kil Hwan Yong, step down" and "Park Geun Hye, make an apology".

articles.title: KCTU Confirms June Action Program
articles.content:
KCTU Confirms June Action Program
Pyongyang, June 1 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Confederation of Trade Unions (KCTU) held a meeting of its Central Executive Committee at its conference room on May 28 at which it confirmed its June action program, according to the south Korean paper Labor and World and internet paper Thongil News.
					 It said that the KCTU general action late in June is chiefly aimed to force the irresponsible and incompetent Park Geun Hye regime step down, abolish the man-killing policy of the "government" including denationalization, easing of regulation and expansion of part-time jobs and organize workers' action to defend life, security and dignity.
					
					 It is also aimed to probe the truth about the ferry Sewol sinking accident, punish those responsible for it and prevent the recurrence of similar accidents, the organization noted.
					
					 It declared the general action period from June 23 to 28.
					
					 Meanwhile, the KCTU held a press conference at Chonggye Plaza, Seoul on May 29 at which it declared that it would wage an action to denounce the arrest of the secretary general of the organization and probe the truth about the ferry Sewol disaster.

articles.title: Park Geun Hye Regime's Deception and Perfidy Slammed
articles.content:
Park Geun Hye Regime's Deception and Perfidy Slammed
Pyongyang, June 1 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Federation of Koreans in the U.S. on May 26 issued a commentary denouncing the south Korean puppet group for committing acts of deception and perfidy.
					 The commentary said:
					
					 The words "Stay put" come across one's mind before anything else when thinking of the ferry Sewol disaster in south Korea.
					
					 Those concerned of the ferry made children stay calm, obviously knowing that if they did not rescue students from the sinking ferry, they will die.
					
					 What the Park Geun Hye regime showed as regards the disaster is nothing but lies, deception, perfidy and intrigues. We can never think little of the words "Stay put".
					
					 The Park regime has always demanded the people stay calm though they called for probing the truth behind many conspiratorial cases which have occurred since she took office. So, it will demand the people continue staying calm though they die due to difficulties and hardships.
					
					 The group which hopes that the people will stay calm in the forthcoming local elections is none other than the Park regime, the criminal group which mercilessly killed children aboard the ferry Sewol.
					
					 We can not stay calm any longer but turn out in action, the commentary noted, calling upon people of all social standings to turn out in the action to root out the Park regime.

articles.title: Korean in U.S. Praises Socialism of Juche Centered on People
articles.content:
Korean in U.S. Praises Socialism of Juche Centered on People
Pyongyang, June 1 (KCNA) -- The director of the Institute of Independent Ideology in the U.S. made public an article praising socialism of Juche centered on people.
					 The article lauded socialism of Juche in the north as a unique and advantageous socialism which was built by its people according to their will under its specific condition on the basis of the Juche idea and operated by them their way.
					
					 Socialism of Juche in the north is the most advantageous one in which people become masters of everything and everything serves them and the leader, party, army and popular masses are united in one mind, the article said.
					
					 The ferry Sewol disaster brought into bolder relief the nature of the south Korean society as a neo-colony of the U.S. imperialists, the article noted, and went on:
					
					 The Park Geun Hye regime is serving money and capital.
					
					 Its capitalists and their defenders have mobilized all media and educational organs to describing the north as an evil in a bid to cover up their unpopular nature.
					
					 However, the ferry Sewol disaster showed the world that the south Korean society is the den of evils.
					
					 Through the disaster the south Korean people found out an alternative, not capitalism. The alternative is socialism of Juche centered on people, not on materials.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Exploits Praised by Beninese Figures
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Exploits Praised by Beninese Figures
Pyongyang, June 1 (KCNA) -- Beninese figures praised the exploits of President Kim Il Sung at the inaugural ceremony of the Beninese national committee for remembering him held in Cotonou on May 26.
					 Hessou Kohovi, chairman of the Benin-Korea Amicable Association "Long Live Kim Jong Il, Supreme Leader" and chairman of the Benin National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, said:
					
					 The august name of Kim Il Sung means the sun. 
					
					 He lightened the way for mankind and provided a flower garden of love with ardent passion and all people were attracted by his great magnanimity. 
					
					 He founded the great Juche idea to indicate the way to be followed by mankind. 
					
					 The Juche idea that the popular masses are the master of the revolution and construction and they promote the revolution and construction is the idea which scientifically clarified the way for accomplishing the cause of the popular masses for independence for the first time in the history of human thought. 
					
					 The founding of the Juche idea made it possible to open the era of independence where the working masses, once subject to exploitation and oppression, driven out of history in the past, emerge as the master of history.
					
					 Pascal Zouncheme, chief of the Benin Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism and rector of Cotonou Institute of Journalism of Benin, said:
					
					 Kim Il Sung took good care of people with his warm humanity. 
					
					 He devoted his all to the people, regarding it as his motto to believe in the people as in Heaven.
					
					 He will always be alive in the hearts of mankind as the eternal sun.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in Hungary
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in Hungary
Pyongyang, June 1 (KCNA) -- The Hungarian committee for remembering President Kim Il Sung was inaugurated in Budapest on May 26. 
					 Gyula Thurmer, chairman of the Hungarian Workers' Party, was elected chairman of the remembrance committee. 
					
					 The committee decided to hold colorful political and cultural events praising the revolutionary career and exploits of Kim Il Sung between May 26 and July 9.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in Nigeria
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in Nigeria
Pyongyang, June 1 (KCNA) -- The Nigerian national committee for remembering Generalissimo Kim Il Sung was formed in Abuja on May 26. 
					 Ibrahim Mantu, member of the Credit Committee of the People's Democratic Party of Nigeria and chairman of the Nigeria-Korea Friendship Association, was elected chairman of the remembrance committee. 
					
					 The committee decided to hold diverse political and cultural functions praising the revolutionary career and exploits of President Kim Il Sung on the occasion of the 20th anniversary of his demise and give wide publicity to the struggle of the Korean people achieving big successes in the building of a thriving nation and the standoff with the U.S. under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in Benin
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in Benin
Pyongyang, June 1 (KCNA) -- The Beninese national committee for remembering President Kim Il Sung was inaugurated in Cotonou on May 26. 
					 Hessou Kohovi, chairman of the Benin-Korea Amicable Association "Long Live Kim Jong Il, Supreme Leader" and chairman of the Benin National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, was elected chairman of the remembrance committee. 
					
					 The committee decided to organize multifarious events praising the revolutionary career and exploits of Kim Il Sung on the occasion of the 20th anniversary of his demise.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Posted by Peruvian Organization on Its Website
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Posted by Peruvian Organization on Its Website
Pyongyang, June 1 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Brilliantly Accomplish the Revolutionary Cause of Juche, Holding Kim Jong Il in High Esteem as the Eternal General Secretary of Our Party" was posted by the Peru-Korea Institute of Culture and Friendship on its website on May 26. 
					 The work, published on April 6, Juche 101 (2012), says that holding leader Kim Jong Il in high esteem as eternal general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) is a principled requirement to victoriously advance the cause of the Korean revolution. It also clarifies the tasks for steadily developing the WPK into the glorious party of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Seminar on Exploits of Peerless Great Men Held in Russia
articles.content:
Seminar on Exploits of Peerless Great Men Held in Russia
Moscow, May 31 (KCNA) -- A seminar on the exploits performed by President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il, peerless great men of Mt. Paektu, to develop the DPRK-Soviet Union and DPRK-Russia friendship took place at the Russian newspaper Pravda in Moscow on May 27 to mark the 65th anniversary of Kim Il Sung's first historic official visit to the Soviet Union and the 30th anniversary of his official visit to it in 1984.
					 Present at the seminar were Taysaev, vice-chairman of the Economic Policy Committee of the State Duma of Russia and secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation; Komotski, deputy to the State Duma, permanent member of the C.C., Communist Party of the Russian Federation and editor-in-chief of Pravda; Makarov, deputy to the State Duma and member of the C.C., Communist Party of the Russian Federation; and other politicians, scholars, journalists and editors.
					
					 Invited to the seminar were staff members of the DPRK embassy in Moscow and members of the delegation of officials of the Workers' Party of Korea on a visit to Russia.
					
					 Speeches were made by Komotski, Makarov, and Chief of Section for Korea Vorontsov and senior researcher Vanin of the Institute of Oriental Studies of the Russian Academy of Sciences.
					
					 The speakers said that it was of great significance that Kim Il Sung visited the Soviet Union more than 20 times and Kim Jong Il visited the Russian Federation three times, noting that they made great contributions to developing the DPRK-Soviet Union and the DPRK-Russia friendship all their lives.
					
					 Now the Russia-DPRK relations are growing stronger under the deep care of supreme leader Kim Jong Un, the speakers said, adding that Korean-style socialism wisely led by him is the beacon of hope for progressive mankind.

articles.title: Important Day of DPRK Celebrated in Different Countries
articles.content:
Important Day of DPRK Celebrated in Different Countries
Pyongyang, June 1 (KCNA) -- Events took place in different countries on the occasion of the 50th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 A lecture and film show took place in Nigeria and a lecture, photo exhibition and film show in Guinea on May 22 and 26.
					
					 Displayed at the venue of the photo exhibition were photos dealing with exploits of President Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 On display there were photos showing the Korean people building a thriving nation.
					
					 Films shown included Korean film "Monument to Party Founding".
					
					 Ahmed Blaza Lawan, chairman of the Nigerian Group for the Study of the Songun Politics, said:
					
					 Kim Jong Il had paid deep attention to the unity of the whole party in idea and purpose since he started the work at the C.C., the WPK. He set forth the programme to imbue the whole party with the Juche idea, the revolutionary idea of Kim Il Sung, and energetically led the work to do so.
					
					 He made sure that the WPK has consistently maintained its revolutionary principles. This is one of the distinguished exploits performed by him in the party building.
					
					 The Korean people and progressive mankind will always remember Kim Jong Il who formulated the original Songun politics based on the Songun idea as the basic political mode under socialism, thoroughly applied it and thus defended the sovereignty and dignity of the country and socialism and made a great contribution to the world peace and security.
					
					 The vice-chairman of the Guinean Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia Association said that Kim Jong Il was a great leader in the era of independence who devoted his whole life to the happiness of the people and the accomplishment of the cause of global independence.
